import React from 'react'; import './Header.css'; import cx from 'classnames'; import { useAppContext } from "../AppContext"; import { useState } from 'react'; export const Header = () => { const [showMobileNav, toggleMobileNav] = useState(false); const { cart } = useAppContext(); const calculateCartItems = () => { let total = 0; cart.forEach((item) => (total += item.quantity)); return total; }; return (
  • Shop
  • About
  • Support
  • Blog
  • Account
  • {calculateCartItems()}
Shop About Support
Skin Hair & Body Sets Accessories Shop All
) } export default Header;
